chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: lb
a: lb

Goal:
a ↓ b ⪯ b

Premises:
Notation lb := (list bool)
lb_meet_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↓ a ⪯ m ↓ b
lb_meet_dec_left : forall a b : lb, a ↓ b ⪯ a
lb_meet_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> (l ++ a) ↓ (m ++ b) = l ↓ m ++ a ↓ b
lb_meet_length : forall a b : lb, length a = length b -> length (a ↓ b) = length a
lb_join_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↑ a ⪯ m ↑ b
lb_mask_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ++ a ⪯ m ++ b
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
lb_join_inc_left : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ a ↑ b
lb_join_inc_right : forall a b : lb, b ⪯ a ↑ b
lb_ortho_anti_left : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x
lb_pointwise_mono_left : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
lb_ortho_sym : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a
lb_mask_equiv_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ≂ m -> a ≂ b -> l ++ a ≂ m ++ b
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
Ascii.N_of_digits = fix N_of_digits (l : lb) : BinNums.N := match l with | nil => BinNums.N0 | b :: l' => BinNat.N.add (if b then BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH else BinNums.N0) (BinNat.N.mul (BinNums.Npos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) (N_of_digits l')) end : lb -> BinNums.N Arguments Ascii.N_of_digits _%list_scope
Field_theory.rdiv6 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b : R, ~ req a rO -> ~ req b rO -> req (rinv (rdiv a b)) (rdiv b a)
Field_theory.rdiv2b : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b c d e : R, ~ req (rmul b e) rO -> ~ req (rmul d e) rO -> req (radd (rdiv a (rmul b e)) (rdiv c (rmul d e))) (rdiv (radd (rmul a d) (rmul c b)) (rmul b (rmul d e)))
lb_meet = lb_pointwise andb : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_meet (_ _)%list_scope
lb_join = lb_pointwise orb : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_join (_ _)%list_scope
lb_meet_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_meet_mono H2 H5) (lb_meet_mono H3 H6) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv) lb_meet Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ⪯ y ↓ y0 /\ y ↓ y0 ⪯ x ↓ x0 Arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
Field_theory.rdiv4b : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> (forall p q : R, req p q -> req (rinv p) (rinv q)) -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b c d e f : R, ~ req (rmul b e) rO -> ~ req (rmul d f) rO -> req (rmul (rdiv (rmul a f) (rmul b e)) (rdiv (rmul c e) (rmul d f))) (rdiv (rmul a c) (rmul b d))
Field_theory.rdiv7b : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> (forall p q : R, req p q -> req (rinv p) (rinv q)) -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b c d e f : R, ~ req (rmul b f) rO -> ~ req (rmul c e) rO -> ~ req (rmul d f) rO -> req (rdiv (rdiv (rmul a e) (rmul b f)) (rdiv (rmul c e) (rmul d f))) (rdiv (rmul a d) (rmul b c))
Field_theory.pow_pos_div : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall (a b : R) (p : BinNums.positive), ~ req b rO -> req (Ring_theory.pow_pos rmul (rdiv a b) p) (rdiv (Ring_theory.pow_pos rmul a p) (Ring_theory.pow_pos rmul b p))
lb_meet_comm : forall l m : lb, l ↓ m = m ↓ l
lb_meet_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), (x :: l) ↓ (y :: m) = x && y :: l ↓ m
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : BinNums.Z => match a with | BinNums.Z0 => (BinNums.Z0, BinNums.Z0) | BinNums.Zpos a0 => match b with | BinNums.Z0 => (BinNums.Z0, a) | BinNums.Zpos b0 => let (q, r) := BinNat.N.pos_div_eucl a0 (BinNums.Npos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | BinNums.Zneg b0 => let (q, r) := BinNat.N.pos_div_eucl a0 (BinNums.Npos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.opp (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q), BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | BinNums.Zneg a0 => match b with | BinNums.Z0 => (BinNums.Z0, a) | BinNums.Zpos b0 => let (q, r) := BinNat.N.pos_div_eucl a0 (BinNums.Npos b0) in...
lb_meet_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ≂ y ↓ y0
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
Field_theory.rdiv5 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b : R, req (ropp (rdiv a b)) (rdiv (ropp a) b)
lb_meet_left : forall x : lb, x ↓ nil ≂ nil
lb_meet_right : forall x : lb, nil ↓ x ≂ nil
lb_ortho_meet_nil : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y < -> x ↓ y ≂ nil

lb_ortho_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_mask_trans : forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> m ⪯ k -> l ⪯ k
